metadata.synopsis: Behaviour AD for a doppelganger disguised as female dwarf in Figaro's, while Dolor is torturing Figaro.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Be near S_LOW_SerialKiller_Figaro_Doppelganger_003_e1ea7d43-2b85-45da-9778-3e4f6197dd9a after the Wine Festival scene.

0.speaker: Wobb
0.text: Gods, Master Figaro must be dilligent to spend so long with a client.
